lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much, Marvel Puzzle Quest! Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, for the sponsorship opportunity, I know that I have this habit of doing a bit, doing some comedy at the top of the show, and it's all funny and clever and brilliant and all that. But today, I'm just going to do it serious. This is a serious sponsor and they need our serious, unadulterated attention. So I'm just going to read the copy, I swear to god. Okay. Our sponsor tonight is Marvel Puzzle Quest. Recruit all your favorite Avengers, from Black Panther, Captain America, (fart noise) Iron Man, The Hulk (fart noise), Black Widow, and more! (extended fart) Create a super-villain dream team and recruit Infinity Gauntlet-wielding Thanos to wage your own war! (excessive fart noises) Mix and match to create the ultimate team of three, and battle it out in Match Three War! (squeaky fart) Marvel Puzzle Quest is available on iOS, Android, Amazon, and Steam. Download it now for free. (so many fart noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: God, Sam, holy shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just read the copy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your own joke broke you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What episode is this?! How many episodes did it take to finally get to this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Marvel Puzzle Quest gets the best stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have officially hit

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have steamed the shark.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got to be careful. Marvel Marketing is going to start stealing from your bucket of tricks. We're going to see trailers with farts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So let's see. Other announcements? We have a quick one tonight, I think.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's the charity stream with Satine on Saturday. The Roll20 dealio that she's doing is this Saturday, all-day D&D for charity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Support it if you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was the early days of streaming RPGs online, before it was a thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ones that we didn't get to, we might carry over into the first week of the new year or something. We'll figure it out. We want to get through as many of these as we can, but we have a large bulk of them coming to you next Thursday in this time slot. So check it out next week! Let's see. Any other announcements you guys want to bring up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: January 5th through the 7th, I think it is. We'll be in Sacramento.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, me and Marisha are both happy to be hosting with the folks who make Gwent. If you're familiar with the Witcher, they have their own card game.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't like Witcher, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll have information on our Twitters and social media if you want to follow and check out both Gwent. We're streaming tomorrow morning, actually, our last stream of us getting prepped, and we're meeting with a bunch of guys in the community that are showing us the ins and outs of some of the factions and decks. So if you're like us and up early tomorrow on Twitch, we'll be there. We'll figure out all of the information on Twitter. All right. Anything else, guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did podcast get updated, or did that not happen? It may not have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's coming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Percy's playlist went out and now there's a Vex podcast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm working on it. I started writing today.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't have one because it was going to be all death metal, followed with nursery rhymes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to know what kind of death metal you're into.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Technonic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, in case life happened. So we signed about a hundred extra and we magically found them the other day. So your last chance--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you tell me where we found them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was somewhere, I think, literally in the boiler room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I was about to say, it was probably the boiler room because that's where shit goes and vanishes. We are kind of a mess on occasion, this is true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we're a web company. We wouldn't be a mess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Individually and as a collective fumbling our way through existence day to day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But anyway, they are in the store right now. This is your last chance. If you're like, "Oh "no, I saw them!" But only a hundred-- and they're gone. So yeah, last-minute Christmas present for anyone who was looking for something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Marisha and I came out in another episode of Madness. Some more improvised gameplay with blocks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you're not watching it, holy crap. Go watch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, as apparently Sam transformed into his ultimate, final form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The King of Egos.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many is this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's Sams all the way down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There are six pictures of me, plus me, so that's seven. Lucky seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seventh Sam-urai. So folks. Not long--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait a second. You're doing a story? I thought we were just going to kill each other!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a narrative.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let him paint his picture.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you met Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not long before you finish your preparations for the final battle with Vecna, you all spent an evening going to rest with unease and as sleep took you, a vision fills your mind. Groggily you come to, wiping the insides of your eyelids, trying to find some means of grasping the scenario around you. As unfamiliar smells of stale water and crushed stone begin to fill your sinuses, the light blearing into your vision, you slowly focus to look around you and find a strange assortment of structures in the vicinity. And there above you, cracking through the clouds with a thunderous boom, you see a cloaked figure descend from the heavens, hands held aloft, palms up to the sky as bolts of energy arc around its form. As it slowly drifts, hovering above this central tower, the sconces of flame below burning with embers that drift up with the wind and vanish. The cloaked figure spins around, revealing the face beneath the hood, a well groomed, beautiful, familiar beard and his perfectly combed hair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I feel better now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he spins around, making eye contact with the five of you members of Vox Machina, his voice billows out, "You've come again. And here you are, and since you're here I think it's time that you "show me what you've got. Show me what you've got!" With a thunderous clap he vanishes. You see a singular column of green energy left behind where he stood, that now rests upon the top of the pillar. You watch as these two disparate towers on two ends of the battlefield begin to slowly spin as energy crackles throughout them. You look around the field for any sort of view of your opponents and all you see are your friends, and you know in that moment that this is another challenge from the Great Colville, to show who amongst you is most powerful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But if we know that in advance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His voice cracks out from the heavens, "Roll initiative."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, do we have time to precast?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To do like a little--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take your precast and shove it in your ass, Keyleth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like you need something else.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You need an edge on us all?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I do! It's not my fault that my character's awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Using my first luck of the day at the top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I inspire myself on this roll? I forget, it's an ability check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an ability check, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will inspire myself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I give myself an inspiring leader speech?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's ten minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can do this, you can do this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm one luck down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One inspiration down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm checking real fast here, hold onto your numbers for a moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In my luck box. One, two, three, four, five, six, seven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which can include yourself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit, I forget what Mythcarver does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've used it twice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll put it this way, does everybody have something they wish to prepare before the battle?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as a note, whatever potions that you had on yourself that are healing potions, are out of this battle, as you check your contents of your pockets.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, not really. I want to rage, that's it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The only thing I can think to do is I would want to already have my Boots of Spider Climbing activated and my Diplomacy charged.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How about, instead of a speech, can I cast Freedom of Movement on myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM, MATT
lines.text: Wings are already out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to cast freedom of movement on me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We get to pose before the battle right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I'm the only one here, I don't know, I can't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take in the gravity of the situation you can see a small sparkle around you as a containment field marks the exterior of this battlefield both around and roughly 80 to 100 feet in the air.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 80 to 100 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Find out the hard way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I won't. I ain't going up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Initiative orders. 25 to 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing) Everybody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled pretty good, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we have currently Percy at 24, Scanlan at 21, Grog at 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, fuck you. Give it to me. She doesn't need it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bullshit! Bullshit! Fucking Mr. Sneak Attack!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughing) What are you talking about? You are the clear winner of this game!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't say that! I've lost all of them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like you both, right now, to roll a dexterity check. Roll a d20, add your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He may have to burn another luck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just my modifier, my straight modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Because technically you're on the same initiative, but I can't have you doing your actions at the exact same time. This is to see who's slightly faster.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a 15, for 17 total.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 32, motherfucker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus! That's your wife!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait. How'd you get 32?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 19, my dex is a 13.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's your saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your saving throw, it's a dexterity check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still higher than you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still higher.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 19. It's a saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just an ability check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine, you beat Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Learn your character sheet, motherfucker! (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So there is a burst of speed and Vax is ever so faster than Keyleth. His dextrous capabilities edge her out of the initiative order, so Keyleth, you're taking up the rear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was so stoked about my 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. With that, as those two towers are currently crackling, Percival, it's your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, it's been a while.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how to play this character anymore. I've totally forgotten everything I can do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the last time we're going to play these characters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run into this room and I want to see what's inside this building.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you rush around. That's about as far as you get with your movement. Looking inside, you see a large cluster of sigils carved into the ground with crystals sticking out and it's this low pulsing purple energy. Make a perception check, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Castlevania teleport mode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. You notice a small groove of similar pulsing kind of purplish-blue energy that runs from the circle and out of the chamber, which is this line here. And then you also barely see on the edge what appears to be an archway, a door that is built that has a slight shifting barrier of mist where the archway is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to spend the rest of my action moving into the archway of mist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move into the archway?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and with that you move here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much movement do I have left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where it puts you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And having revealed those two elements of the battlefield. Going to leave those two open for the time, but there is a roof up there about ten feet tall. End of your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't see me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to turn invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't see anybody. I'm going to pick a random direction. That's right. I'm going to run to the right. Is this a door that I can get in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is currently a door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Currently a door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meaning it is a door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll run over that way. I only go 25 feet. Or 25 things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And bonus action I can't dash, right, no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You're not a rogue, buddy, no. Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I've never dashed! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you are currently considered invisible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have a thingy for that? I have a cake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been a few weeks since we played and I left my markers at home. But that's okay. That cake means you're invisible. It's an invisibility cake. All right, finishing Scanlan's turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Raging, can I run around the side of the tower that's closest to you towards the door of this little Superman shaped-- yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30, you're at the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use siege to knock the fucking door open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an attack against the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we hearing things? Can we hear the crack of wood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20, go ahead and roll damage. You now hear a thunderous roar, Grog's voice billowing out from the air not too far from you across a moat-like pond of clear water that surrounds the vicinity of the central tower. With a smashing sound, you see wood splinter off into the air.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A d4 for the fit hands or with the axe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the axe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit balls ass, sorry. Nope, that's a ten. Eight plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the Bloodaxe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bloodaxe is a d12.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is, right, I was using the sword before that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, d12. What did you roll?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's an eight on both of them, plus-- Sorry, been a hot minute. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23, double eight? Yeah, the door is destroyed. It's blown inside, the hinges kind of (squeaking sound) and what little bit of the door still remains kind of breaks off and slams into the ground, and revealing the interior of this chamber, the door now open. It is empty except for a singular chest sitting in the far corner from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have any movement left? What did I end on, 40?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was 30, you still have 20 feet of movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make my way to the chest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it's not a bonus action to open said chest, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, that would be an action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stay in my room!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, both of the towers-- the sparking energy arcs outward and nobody's in the vicinity, so no worries there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as energy sparks offward and hits the other structures nearby and then eventually pulls back into the towers and the glow is slowly building once more. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I am sending you something. I'm going to use a bonus action to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll a stealth check, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. Nobody can see me, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not at the moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, that is a 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here it comes to you. And I've charted this right, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on deck, Keyleth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we playing Battleship now? Are you sending him moves? Is this what's happening?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Vax vanishes into the shadows of the field. Let's see here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Feel me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, shite. Yes it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, ends Vax's turn, Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, question, clarification on blindsight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to look it up. You're blind but you can still see through you being awesome?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is this in reference to a creature?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blindsight means that they either don't use their eyes to see and as such Blind doesn't affect them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, like the worms and stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Creatures without eyes, such as grimlocks, grey oozes, either it's naturally blind and can see without having to use the eyes or if it's ever blinded it doesn't affect it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so I wouldn't be able to see through Scanlan's Invisibility with blindsight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not with blindsight, with tremor sense you would still feel him running across.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was getting clarification on. I am going to cast Sunbeam at 6th level, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you casting it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sunbeam. Myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. It creates a beam when you cast it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As an action I get to create a beam, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, but when you initially cast it you create a beam so if you want to fire at wherever and it's gone, that's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Well then, how about this? I want to peek around this corner over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My tremor sense hears her moving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you very plainly see Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to do Sunbeam.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, to be fair, is the most Vox Machina opening thing to destroy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is for 115 episodes, you bitch!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did I destroy the door? Is that what you're saying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Travis did earlier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You didn't destroy everything!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Percy, I need you to make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Constitution saving throw. This is magical, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I get advantage on this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that versus my spell level?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, your spell DC.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's your spell DC? Oh, okay, constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's pretty high.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, I think that saves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That hits, so you are not blinded but you do still take the damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half as much damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Half as much. 6d8 radiant. (counting) 33 damage total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33 damage. Half that. You take 16 points of radiant damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take 16 points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I use my bonus action to turn into an earth elemental. I still have a little bit of movement, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use the rest of my movement to peek back around there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How big is that thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's considered a large creature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it taller than the roof?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Because about ten feet tall, it's about as tall as the roof. But you do see Keyleth come out of the side, blast a Sunbeam-- Your line of sight over there, you barely see her rush around the corner, fire this beam of energy, and then (whooshing) into an elemental and then curl around the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice! Just going to crack my knuckles then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Keyleth's turn, Percy you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hop right back through that door, and take a right out that door and start heading back out that-- yeah, right there, and then I'm going to use the rest of my-- to cast Silence. I'm casting my silence ball, I am now completely quiet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Except for tremor sense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where'd he go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know where he went.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Percy has Silence on him, Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Shoot! I saw her. (to Marisha) I saw you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I saw you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's see here, 25 feet gets me to either here or here, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, 25 would put you-- almost.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I can't get somewhere where I can see her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not at the moment, it doesn't look like. You know where she went, but you don't see her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As I walk, I will try that door, see if it opens. Does it open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk up to the door, and you're going to try it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's locked.

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: This is so great. No, that was a natural one. So I take it. How much was it?

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. Another heavy hit right after the bolt of lighting dissipates over the horizon, you see splintered woods as an axe swings over the range of the nearby roof of that building. You hear an angry goliath yell as the door is sundered, opening to the chamber within.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sphere of Annihilation!

lines.text: All right, that's your turn.

lines.text: So I'm going to open that chest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. And that's how many feet? That's like five. So I can now, I have a little bit of movement to leave. Ten, 15, 20. So I can at least use 20 to get to that corner there. Yeah, toward me. There, just there. Do I see Scanlan or is he still invisible?

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: I'm going to shoot Scanlan. Let's use Bad News for-- actually, let's use, oh this'll be fun. Let's do Animus, sharpshooter, and deadeye, just for fun. Animus, sharpshooter, deadeye.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: I can't hear him.

lines.text: Well, and you're further than 60 feet from him, I think, actually. Yeah, so it wouldn't work.

lines.text: Animus, sharpshooter, dead shot. Oh, you're so lucky that didn't crit. 28 to hit.

lines.text: That's 1d10 plus 1d6 psychic, plus I'm going to-- eh, not on this one. This is shot number one. So that's, oh, that's terrible. I'm glad I did not. That's nine points of damage plus one point of psychic, so that's ten points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For your next shot--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You take 20 points of damage because that was sharpshooter. 20, excuse me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're very lucky. That also hits. That's 29 to hit and then the same thing, 1d10 plus 1d6 plus 18. 26 points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: So Percival, that's the end of your turn? Scanlan, you're up. You watched this earth elemental dive into the tower right next to you in this open space. You get shot the fuck up. You're covered in your own blood and you watch Percival in the distance slink out of sight. And you're hurting bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was so pleasing.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One shot! I did

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's awful.

lines.text: Currently? What's the tremor sense?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.text: All right.

lines.text: First one is 20 total. No, I'm sorry, 22 total.

lines.text: Yeah, you just punch the door in and your fist goes through it and you have to pull it off the hinges and shake it off of your giant battering ram-like fist. The door opens, reveals a singular chest against the other wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'll go ahead and open that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's an action to open it, but you can move up. What's your movement as an earth elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 30 feet walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 feet? Yeah, you'd be able to just get up to the chest but you don't have another action to open it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. This is like a building, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're having to duck down to get in there. It's about ten feet tall and you're like eleven-foot tall as an earth elemental, probably littler than 12, so you're crouched down a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm in there then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Percival, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to take this opportunity to head out of the room and I want to climb up on top of this building. Then right up to this corner right here. Actually, this corner right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's the end of your movement, you'll be able to get there.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently no, you can not.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, she's inside. I'm going to go to the center of it and if I could use my action to lay down and hide if that's possible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, your movement's there so you can't move any further.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to lay down and, since I'm on the roof, pull down to the roof and see if I can get cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Are you trying to hide, or are you just trying to give yourself cover?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're going prone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going prone and I want to keep an eye on that front door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's movement to go up, is it movement to go down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got any left? Got any movement left? To go prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no, to drop prone is fine. To get up out of prone is just dropping to the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he close enough to where I feel a body go (thud)?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also completely silenced. Ten feet all around me are completely silenced.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately. I mean, it is vibration in the air, but that's not going to stop vibration in the ground. It just dampens the sound. Nope. He's just outside of it, so you feel nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep an eye on that tower, and if I see any movement I'm going to unload an action on anything I see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. Make a general perception check for me, if you don't mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Saving throw, yeah, sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, perception. That's a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Percy's turn, Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Healing Word on myself, at level one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is the coward's way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's three plus six, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great, awesome, nine more points, guys! I can see Grog. I could take a pot shot at him, but that would just kick the hornet's nest a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could score eight points of damage on him and then die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You'd die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need to just heal. In that case, I will dominate Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, shit, no, I can't do that. Is he worked up, is he raging, can I tell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah, he's going (huffing).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, forget that then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you've worked with him enough to know that while he's raging charm effects--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Forget it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry. I'm giving you guys benefit of the doubt that you've all worked together enough to the point where you do notice elements of techniques and tells. Because it's helped you in the past.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did Matt just say! We all know you have that!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, just so that you guys would think I'm a kindly old man who just walked onto the battlefield.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, let's see how well that goes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, put down your weapon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me tell you. If there's anything to turn Vox Machina away, it's elderly people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was going to kill my friends,

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I use my bonus action Healing Word, to heal myself, can I also use my action to cast a higher level healing word on myself? Or is that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's a bonus action, it's used. Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Then I will cast Minor Image. Minor Illusion or whatever it's called. That only has 60-feet range, 30-feet range, 60-feet range?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I smell so bad. I'm sweating so much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're fine! There's nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need deodorant.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. You know what, I'll do Major Image then. Fine. Fuck it. I'm going to do Major Image and it's going to sure look like Scanlan is just walking right out to the edge of the water right there. Not from there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Use the cake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's just going to appear right there, he's going to come out from around that corner and look out like he's looking for a target.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, glancing over you can see Scanlan emerges from around the corner, keeping an eye, looking around the battlefield, and doesn't seem to notice you're there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have to shoot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, he wasn't holding an action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought you said you were holding your action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm holding an action for the tower.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got it. Wait, for the tower? I thought you said "I'm holding an action until I see anyone."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm keeping an eye on the tower because that's where I'm heading next.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. That's my action then. I'm done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't worry, I will shoot at you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog. Top of your round. You watch as the braziers at the base of the tower flare up and flames consume this outer area just on the outskirts. Not the top, but just the surrounding area of the tower and then die down, the walls of flame burning to an ember and then vanishing. It's your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I come inside here. Can you step on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a small, a sigil raised platform.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do it. I dare you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I'm just curious. I mean it's hard to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Say yes. When in doubt, say yes. What's the worst thing that can happen? Other than your spells get disenchanted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes and, Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go through the portal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Out the other side you emerge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I head this way? Can I dash and continue my action and head towards--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Head down this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get right up-- oh god. You get right about there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action to use my boots of feral leaping to jump into the doorway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check to see if it succeeds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I admire your commitment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Now I need you to make an acrobatics check for me because it is a very small doorframe you're trying to leap into.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's just the one. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do jump, but your head and shoulders slam into the doorframe. So you get the additional leap. You're now in the doorframe, you're blocking it off. You have a little bit of extra movement, but that's as far as you can get. You have a ringing in your ears and you're like, "That "smarts a little bit."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my whole action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, as you're there by the chest, you hear (grunting). You turn around and see Grog in the doorway like (grunting), looking at you right in the face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In Terran I say: Hey Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Grog's turn. Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quick question! Already sent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First question: no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that true?! Tell me after. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Text your actions!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mid-game! You're asking to get fucked with!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Third question.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shaved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jesus! Okay. Good to know. That brings us to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're now between a chest and blocked door frame with Grog in it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. How the fuck did Grog get all the way over there?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Through the portal over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's amazing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was coming!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't call it a comeback, he's been there for years.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is somewhere going: You got this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I keep forgetting to ask you. Make a concentration check when you took damage as a fire elemental with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If it's anything like Hide & Seek, you'd probably be like: I really have to pee right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would just do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the fire elemental's constitution.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's even better. What do I have to make? I keep my spell attack, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I wanted to see if you lost concentration on the Sunbeam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, cool. It was 26 or 27 damage, so you would have to make a 13 or 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, then I just made it. No, I'm totally good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Keyleth? You guys are playing it really safe now!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm in the doorway with a giant earth elemental. I punched my ticket; I'm ready to ring the bell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I stuck my face out and I got 140 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you-- okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth's smug. Scanlan's like: Ugh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I take it back. One of you is playing it real safe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're aware!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He may not even be playing with us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is on Twitter right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) I stealthed myself out of the narrative! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What're you doing, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take Grog and use my slam attacks, my multiattack, to take him and body slam into this chest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, you can certainly try!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sure!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I can jump and smash my head on the door like an idiot approaching you, might as well tit for tat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You first attack would have to be a grapple attempt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My strength versus his, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your athletics versus his.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just an elemental; it doesn't tell me that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If the elemental doesn't have any athletic skill, then it's just your strength modifier. Go ahead and roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a natural 18. So that puts me at 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No shit?! I was not expecting that! Not with advantage! You reach out and grab, and you have Grog. Make your other slam attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which is a slam attack to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Okay. You reach and grab Grog. You slam him and it destroys the chest. It splinters underneath. Roll your slam attack damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which isn't great. Six plus three, nine, plus five, so 14 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of bludgeoning damage to you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not prone, but you are moved to the opposite side of her. The chest is shattered beneath you.

lines.name: LIAM, SAM
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did it release a poison trap in any way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a constitution saving throw. Grog, you make another one as all of a sudden, poison gas fills the entirety of the chamber around you as soon as you destroy this chest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm immune to poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are unaffected by any of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's cool. 29. 17 plus 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you succeed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you double poisoned?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess so. Start stroking out here in a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 points of poison damage reduced to nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he take poison at the top of each turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but he's poisoned, so he has disadvantage on attacks and ability checks until he gets rid of the poison.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make a retaliation? Is that considered melee?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against her? Yeah, I'll allow it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I'm prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not prone. She just moved you over and slammed you into it. You managed to maneuver and get back on your feet, but your impact against the chest destroyed it and released the trap inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I haven't been able to say this in a long time: Can I make this Reckless, Great Weapon Master?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, but you have disadvantage on the attack because of the poison, so it's just a single strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That hits for sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to make life complicated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I know!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got shit I can do, but it's going to be tricky.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have to see the people you're doing it to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh! It's pretty good!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was foolish of you. Well, I don't know. You always have a plan. I ain't going to push it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have a plan tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't believe you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did I break any potions that were under him when I slammed him into the chest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, the whole place is filled with poison smoke. You have no idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take my movement to get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have full movement, he already used his reaction so he doesn't get an attack of opportunity on you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go 20, use my bonus action to turn into a water elemental and then dive under this water?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many elementals can you turn into?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An unlimited number of times?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Archdruid shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are submerged in this water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's why Scanlan's not dead yet. I just wanted to make him desperate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Keyleth's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That ends my turn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, you're up. You turn around and you watch around the corner you have Scanlan peeking around one side and you have Keyleth coming out as an earth elemental, turning into a water elemental then disappearing beneath the surface of the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't see anything else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. But you did hear the impact.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I didn't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't hear shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, right. Silence, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a giant tidal wave moving yonder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a bard over there. I'm going to take a jump onto that island.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hiding under there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Acrobatics check. That's 24.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to spend the rest of my movement running straight up that tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! As you enter the tower--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not entering the tower. I'm running up the tower. Sorry. My fault.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then double run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This central, circular area right there is infused with soft, sparkling, greenish energy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Huh. I've been having bad luck with that lately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The whole top of the tower, or just the middle of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the center circle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a latch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a trap door over that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take cover from Scanlan right there with what's left of my movement against one of the walls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You back up against the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm backing up against the wall and that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You currently have three-quarters cover in that space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. That'll do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Percival's turn, Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action: Healing Word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. So you're holding your Major Image of Scanlan out there right now. Grog, you saw enter the chamber and vanish into the doorway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I know where that goes? No. I don't know how those things work. I heard a bunch of smashing kitty-corner to me and I haven't seen anything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could stand on that thing, though, the platform.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks super-magical, this thing. It's awesome. There's even little feet right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That sounds great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what those are. Are they boots?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stand here. Yeah, you beat me to it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to have Major Image Scanlan ice skate across the water in a jaunty way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ice skating?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's walking on water, as I've always wanted to do.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: You can do that?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's not a real thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can do anything. He's going to walk across the water going, "Hey! Over here! Hey!" While he's creating that distraction, I'm going to peek around and see if I see anything around the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Around this way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You peek around the tower there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, please. I would like you to make a perception check as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance around. You can see, just on the top of the tower, shoulder against the area, the outer edge of Percival's form holding his gun up and taking cover right up on the side there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I duck back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's my Colville die?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of your turn, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The flames burst from the braziers around the tower. The entire area incinerates around the outside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It did that last round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right, I marked that incorrectly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been keeping track.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I forgot to mark that. You watch as the two separate towers give off a burst of lightning energy and do not affect anybody. Keyleth, you notice this. As you're inside the water, which is just regular water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I sent a question and the answer to your roll, too. Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wonderful bottle of Pellegrino for the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Naturally sparkling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled 27? You heard (footsteps).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you wouldn't have heard. Ten feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry, didn't hear it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Silent motherfucker. You're a goddamn Navy SEAL.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is why in a normal game this would be completely crippling me because anything could be happening and you could not tell me. But on a solo mission, it's pretty nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the room that I'm in, can I see anything on the floor since I've been poisoned fucking twice now?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cloud dissipates. You said you want to sift through the rubble?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To see if there's a potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey! Minus how much? Two. 13!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spend your action rummaging through the shattered remains of this. You find bits of the trap mechanism within there and you find a shattered glass vial with trace elements of a healing potion that has since been destroyed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I get down and (licking)?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do! You get down there. You get a familiar weird medicinal, herbal flavor that is mingled with shards of glass that are gathering on the outskirts of your tongue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not worth it. Okay. Yeah, let's see what happens. Can I run out of the room? I'm going to head towards the back portal. Actually, can I get to here? She's in the water, right? She's not sticking out some?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can basically see a slight form in there. Only because you rolled really high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, you beat me last time with a really high roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm an idiot, but you have to be really dumb to go chopping at the water with an axe. It's just water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You would be just dumb enough to do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only a truly dumb person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's just going to change again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You used 25 of your movement, you still have 25 left. You've used your action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll keep running to the entranceway and I'll stay outside. Do I have any more movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have five feet more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't get around the corner, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nah, you'd have to move next to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on deck, Keyleth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings with background music)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should have a countdown clock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings with background music)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Man, Liam's RP is so good tonight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Vax's turn, Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey man, I took my heart out and did this for 115 episodes, all right?! Staying alive!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The last move, though, was so goth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to come out of the water like the Swamp Thing. I'm going to beam Grog with another Sunbeam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, as you're waiting on the side, you hear the ripple of water as you glance over. You watch this giant wave as Keyleth's elemental form emerges from the water. Out of the middle of it, this beam of energy. I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait. Mage Slayer. Advantage on saving throws against spells? I have to be in melee of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You might have to be in melee?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that might be right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll double check, just to be safe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm poisoned, so I have disadvantage on saves, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Against spells cast within five feet of you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I'm poisoned, I have to roll this again for disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Poisoned just gives you disadvantage on ability checks and attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not saving throws?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you take half damage and you're not blinded.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not a great roll this go around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blasted, it burns past your skin. It tickles a little. It's like a bad sunburn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go into my earth elemental form and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is disturbing. I don't know what to do about this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Die!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably not kill the other caster, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this an actual window here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're small slits that you can see through, but that's it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay! Yeah. Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God. I didn't see her do that, did I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. From where you're standing, you heard the blast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He can't hear shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's right! Silence spell, man. It's creepily quiet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You take the good, you take the bad, you take them both and then you have Percy silence.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take your die of inspiration.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so fucked. Yep. This is dumb, but I'm going to do it because I don't know you're there. I'm going to walk over to that weird little door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk into the greenish energy. As you step into this field, your body feels warm. No sound.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just feel warm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just feel warm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a patio heater.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to open the door and see what's in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you don't hear a sound, but it resists.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, blew your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, we get so catty when we can! It's so much fun!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is all I've got.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're never mean to each other, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, just because this green glow is freaking me out, I'm going to back up against the wall and then my next action later is going to be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have you taken any damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have I taken any? Yeah, I've taken 16 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you sense as you're stepping in there, not immediately but the sensation is that similar to one of your allies were to cast a Cure Wounds on you, it has a sort of regenerative property to it, the longer you stand in it. It hasn't taken effect yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, then I'm not going to back up out of it, I'm going to get to the back side of the hinge and I can't hold an action, obviously, because I blew my action, but I'm going to prepare to open and worry about what comes out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you go up into the very edge of that radius and just hold your weapon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends your turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi guys, Scanlan Shorthalt here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a very important message about Marvel Puzzle Quest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like your crown.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's nice, it would look good on me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's lofty. Knowing where Percy is, I'm going to peek around the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Peek around the corner, at this view, you do not have eyeline on Percival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, but I kind of know he's up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know he's up on the tower.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I heard booms distantly over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, you heard thuds of impacts and a burst of energy, you saw like a bright light glow up over the distant sky for a moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Feeling a red-hot anger towards Percy for shooting me--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Bring it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And also gaming out that there's people over here, right centered on this spot I'm going to cast Anti-Gravity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reverse Gravity?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Reverse Gravity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, on that spot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that's fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, your illusion fades, it's concentration.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's one spell I wish we got to use more in-campaign, it's a fun one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bringing it back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 50-foot radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 50-foot radius which would also affect Keyleth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth for sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And anybody in the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. All right so I need Keyleth and Percival to both make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What about my Boots of Spider Climbing that are currently activated?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need Keyleth to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is going to be bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they always attached? Nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're activated, I ain't moving. I can't be knocked prone, you can't do shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, let's go for a ride.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 100 feet up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whee!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) That's 50.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be interesting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because you said the top is like 90 feet up, so I want her to go all the way up to the ceiling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then see what happens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A little unintentional Keyteor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, a hundred percent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you suddenly go firing up into the sky. Percival, you watch as Keyleth spins up, slams into the top of the field, I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a straight con save? Not good, seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 29 points of force damage as you slam into the field, and then it thrusts you 15 feet away from it, and then you head back towards it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do the basketball.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, your hair is standing up on end above you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is like some Freddie Krueger shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a moment to try and right yourself and are now finding yourself having to fly upside down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But that's the same shit, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine. It doesn't do anything to you, but it took you a moment to readjust.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll duck back behind the thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And nobody knows where I am.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we know, okay, we know. AT&T thanks you for your texts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will say: drat, it didn't work on Percy. I'll use my bonus action to say: Percy, I wasn't aiming at you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't hear it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit! He doesn't hear anything!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Scanlan's turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have been waiting to use this Silence spell like an asshole this entire game.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 21 for that roll. That didn't do it, did it? I sent you my roll. They rolled, so did I. I texted you a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It didn't affect anything because you were flying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had to right yourself, but as soon as you started flying upward, you went, "Oh crap!" and you caught yourself. That brings us to Grog's turn at the top of the round. Keyleth and Scanlan, definitely not Percival. Grog, you notice this, too. Behind the entire chamber on each side, it suddenly fills and flashes with that purplish-blue energy. The energy travels through the center and all the water and surrounding also flashes once with that same purple-blue flash and then dissipates and returns to what it was before. You now notice that those rooms are connected to the water and whatever's in the water when that goes off--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was the blue spheres?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that was the purple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Purple horseshoes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: TGIF Flair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to go into the room. Can I stand on the crystal circle? Because I don't see anybody else to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You step onto the crystal circle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I concentrate real hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to concentrate. It's really warm under your feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it? Do I notice any writing or bones around the circle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's pretty clear. But you're a few inches taller than you were a second ago because you're on the platform. That's cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't see anybody. Does it go out to the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it opens up out to the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did I happen to see Keyleth in her earth elemental form, since I was outside, go whoosh and fly up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. You're watching her being--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That seems wrong. Okay. I'm going to use my bonus action to take one of my superior healing potions and that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 8d4 plus eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sent you a monologue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: O for a muse of fire!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To be or not to be!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And down. And up and down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action to turn into an air elemental and fly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it. Not cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so hot. So sexy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your fly speed?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My fly speed: 90 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can get to Percival. You could get to a lot of places from here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many rounds has it been? Do we know, roughly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been nine rounds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine rounds. Then I'll use my last round to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have one more round--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looking down over top of him a good 60 feet almost exactly and right below me going to do my Sunbeam down on top of his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also enter the healing column. I need you to roll a constitution saving throw, Percival.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like the satellite in Akira!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a constitutitution saving? Where's my constitution? There we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pretty good!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! Fucking no one did! Fucking everyone!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not me, I'm loving it. I've hit one person.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've hit zero persons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 25 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Halve that to 12. You take 12 points of radiant damage, Percival, and you shield your eyes just in time as the blast hits you from above to have it not affect your vision.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That ain't bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have about 60 feet of movement if you want, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll fly that way to that corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Staying that far up. You can't fly quite that high up with this range because the ceiling is there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't look at me like that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't have to make concentration checks when you take damage, right? You just stay elemental. You're that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As the elemental, yes. It's my Sunbeam that I've been rolling concentration checks against.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gotcha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's got Cyclops laser until we hit her hard enough. Hey, look who you can see now!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm War Caster with pretty high wisdom, so I'm trying to make it easier to not fail a concentration check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh Jesus!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look who you see now!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, do I see Scanlan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do now! As you float over, you see the tiny little gnome, right there on the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good-bye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (helicopter imitation) LAPD! (helicopter imitation)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, that's a local joke right there!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It'll only be there for four and a half hours from 12:30 to 3:30.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're already on their way in the helicopter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of your turn, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll come back here shortly to ensure that we continue this roundabout battle of care and delicacy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Battle of cowards!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am proud of what I've done so far!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Same.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would like to say, I feel like I've been playing pretty aggressively.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog's been going door-to-door salesman.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have not lost a single hit point, Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have not!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've been looking for Vax!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been sniping the way I've always wanted to. I feel like such a badass right now. I know it's going to end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you again. So let's dive back into this blood drizzle. You know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Waiting for that first blood. Waiting for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's been a lot of first bloods, just no consistent blood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, the Raven Queen took me out of here 20 minutes ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just find his equipment in the middle of the battlefield.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, poor timing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She gave me 20 minutes, she said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round, Percival. First off, you heal 20 hit points as your turn begins inside the column of green light atop the tower. And it's your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to shoot the lock. I'm going to get within ten feet of that lock so that there's no sound and I'm going to shoot the lock open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an attack roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 30 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Where's my fancy--? There we are. That's ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The lock splinters and the trapdoor falls open.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm going to run inside and perch on the ceiling. I'm going to use my Spider Climb boots. And what do I see around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as soon as you rush to the stairs you can see there's a bit of fog on the inside of the chamber. It fills the room and obscures a lot of the interior. So you move up onto the ceiling and you're now underneath, inside the chamber.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't see anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, for the purposes of this, upside-down there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure. I'm going to hide-- and those stairs keep going down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They do. You have 15 more movement if you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go down to the next level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have quite enough movement to get there. You get just to the top of the stairway onto the ceiling. We'll put you there for the sake of keeping track of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I see down there at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the fog kind of dissipates below.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, in that case I'm not going to get that close if I can't get all the way there anyway. So I'm going to get right in that little corner there and keep an eye out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, to look down the stairs you'd have to get--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, I was going to say, I have to get to the other side of the fog? I don't have enough movement to get back from the fog, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're in the fog still but I mean, it dissipates down the stairs. The whole chamber's still filled with fog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to stay in the fog and keep an eye on what's down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Boop. All righty. That ends Percival's turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action: Healing Word.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, you are not rolling those well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have an air elemental swirling 80 feet above you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep. I just sang a little song to myself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've softened him up for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so for all who care, I'm up to 63. And I'm going to look at Keyleth, say into my earring, Friends, let's go fucking kill Vax. At least find him! This is not a fair fight without him! And then I will Dimension Door to the opposite corner again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, good call!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you hear his cry into the earring and watch as, in a flash of vibrant pink-purple energy, he steps through a small, magic-made doorway and vanishes from your sight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anti-gravity still going?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah. Whose turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Scanlan's turn. That brings us to Grog. Sorry. Top of the round, now the exterior of the tower bursts into flames. Fire climbs up and incinerates the island around the central tower, to no effect currently. Grog, your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I turn around, since my magic pedestal has not done anything for me, and go through the portal, please?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, by the way, you see Scanlan as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello! Bye-bye!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten, 15. You're now inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I keep going straight across?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 50. You're about knee-deep in the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my Boots of Feral Leaping to leap horizontally 20 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Well, make the athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, yeah. You just crest onto the edge. Your ankle's kind of at the edge of the water. That's it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fuck it. Can I use my dash to go inside the tower from the bottom door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has he hit the anti-gravity field yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just as you get to the edge of that, I need you to go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, that's my game. Yeah, no. Seven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't know you were even there!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wasn't there. I thought it was put over on that side of the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Grog, as you go--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unintended consequences. Don't worry, I'll get rid of it on the next round-- oh wait. You'll plummet to your death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, he'll survive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't do much but hit things, so you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the purposes of this here, that puts it about fair. Grog, you go flying up into the sky, past the edge of the tower, slamming into the ceiling over the battlefield. I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you do not bounce off to return-- you manage to stop yourself, but you're still about to be forced back into it. You don't get pushed off, but the gravity's still pushing you into it. So each round you're up there, you're going to keep taking this damage. All righty. That finishes Grog's turn. All right. Mr. Stealthy Pants?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stealthy Pants McGee.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you only send him moves in gif form?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How did you know that's what I was doing? This is that kid in the GoCart chair that spins and spins and spins.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure. I'm going to do a Mr. Bean followed by a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Followed by that kid that's like "Oh shit!" as he runs by.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here's the thing, and I'm being fair in this circumstance. Keyleth and Grog, out of the corner of your eye, you see a dash of black, winged movement as, darting from the edge of this tower, you see something out the side of this tower, like climbing on the outside, dart and then vanish in that direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't know that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He didn't go in the tower. He just climbed up the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Her miniature is facing that way. His miniature is facing that way. I'm being a shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to fight me on this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not at all. I started this game knowing that Marisha was going to kill me. Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying so hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so Grog is suspended, being repeatedly beaten into the ceiling?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vibrated to death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, right now-- You didn't bounce off but now you're slammed into it and being slowly pushed into it, like (static crackling).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I saw a black streak go this direction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From this wall to behind where the edge of this building, and then vanish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I know Percy's somewhere in the tower, but I don't know where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Yeah. Let me just try and find people. I'm going to fly over top of where that is and see if I can see anything. I'm going to look for a stealthy Vax. How much movement was that?

lines.name: MATT
