lines.text: That would've been-- oh god. Knocked you over. Actually, as far as you can get is there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Do I see anything from my awesome aerial perspective?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not. There's the open door to the building and there's the circular thing over there but that's all you can see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He could be somewhere over there.

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) Somewhere out there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll fucking shank your ass!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use the rest of my action to move down? To just move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you want to move?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me drop down 60 feet. Or half my movement speed or something like that, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you'd be about, let's say--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, could I see her, by the way, when she flew over and down like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So there you go. That's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Percival, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go the next level down, see what I see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The fog has now begun to dissipate from the entire chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like ten minutes. I'm going to check. I could be wrong because I don't know shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You might be right. I was just guessing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you make fog?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No! Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to tell us anything you did?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't play this game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just heading down, scanning, heading down, scanning, and looking for anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, then never mind. It dissipates because you step out of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm a druid, yo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck, I forgot that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you do Fog Cloud?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, baby!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heading down, there's no furniture, just the stairway. It looks like the interior of this has been either unfurnished or cleared out. It's just a series of empty stairs that lead up and down the tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get all the way to the bottom, then, and back myself against that bottom door and I'm going to push all the way to the bottom of the tower with my movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's your whole turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was hoping there'd be a person in there. I mean, that's all my movement, isn't it? And that's all my action to move that as well, right? Yep, I ran down that tower going, I want to fight everybody!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good boy. Not metagaming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, the m-word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing Percy's turn, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My turn? Jesus Christ, I don't know what to do. I only see Keyleth. I've only seen Keyleth this whole game! Do I see Grog up there, flying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you see Grog up there bouncing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Percy shot you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm of the opinion that, against the wall, I don't think he sees him right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, no, but if you were to look around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you were to back off a bit, you would see him, maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I will peek around the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you move five feet, glance over, and you see Grog currently being jammed up into the ceiling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I kind of know where Keyleth is. I kind of know where Grog is. No one has responded to my text message of "Let's go find Vax."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry, new earring, who's this? Thank you for being the only person who really laughed at my good joke. That was a very good joke. Chat probably liked it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action Healing Word. Oh wait, wrong one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going to use all of his spells to just Healing Word. 1d4 at a time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just slowly build it back up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I will take it all away again next time I see him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus, I don't know what to do. I'm not going to go after Keyleth without backup.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, but here. I'm going after Vax too! Ba ra ra!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't speak English!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, technically she can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, we decided I can because it's telepathic. I'm trying to find my boyfriend! He fucking ditched me at this bar! Fucking asshole!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I get around it without--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get 25 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Actually, no, I don't know where he is at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Baby, are you saving a Wish for me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, your

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's another universe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One's in-game, one's out-of-game.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh sure. Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One's real, Marisha. One's real.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'm going to start going this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get that far, less than that, even.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll use dash to keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get about there. Tiny gnomish legs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is a big-ass map.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is such a big map! I love it! It makes me very dangerous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nobody's there. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really, no one's near the lightning towers?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Getting bug zapped.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Big southern mosquito. 30! 18 plus 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You succeed. So you take 12 points of force damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dear god. That's already halved, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess I could have dropped Anti-Gravity. I forgot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did? Cool. With my bonus action, can I use my Second Wind to heal 1d10 plus my stupid-ass fighter level?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want me to get rid of it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm fucking up here until you don't!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I forgot, I'm sorry! Can I do it now, Matt? No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's cool, I'm up there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to get the immovable rod out in my hand, waiting to fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got the immovable rod out and you're clutching it. So you're holding your action on it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll hold my action if someone comes within striking range. Can I say that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you holding your attack or--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An action, not an attack. My action so I can click the rod.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I sent a question, and here comes a second question. Here it comes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on deck, Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry, my fault. Hi.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got it. Okay. I'm good. So you know what I want to do. I did it already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey man, I worked really hard for 115 episodes. Allow me to be a fuckoff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to look around. No sign of Vax, I'm assuming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you currently stand, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, he's too fucking stealthy! I'm going to go punk Grog. And then I'm going to fly up within 60 feet of him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You just gave up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't find him! I looked!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For legitimately six seconds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm literally the helium balloon in the grocery store that broke away from the cashier and is fucking sitting up there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going on an adventure!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's not going to let me do another perception check! I tried!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the best! Until I die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go up and be like: Sorry, Grog! And hit him with a Blight spell. Let's say level--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's going to shoot off your pinky toe, man!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got another one of those.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's say a level five Blight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, next campaign you're not going to be a meat sponge like this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I won't be. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, that's a failure. So full damage of Blight on Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whatever it is, I'll use my Stone's Endurance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: God, when you play your aasimar ranger, it's going to be so weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I don't know what that first word you said is. Aasimar?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your kenku druid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My tabaxi tortle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tabaxi tortle half-breed bard. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I multi-raced a little since I leveled up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tabaxi with a shell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Someone please draw that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 49 points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let me roll my Stone's Endurance. Ten plus my constitution. Minus 16. So 41 minus 16 would be 25.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where'd that minus 16 go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My Stone's Endurance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, how much damage was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, 49. Sorry, minus 16. So it'd be 33.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 42 plus seven is 49, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, he screams out in pain as he's being pushed into the ceiling. His veins bulge with black energy as the Blight takes hold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you're not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about 50 feet of movement left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Next is the blue, so let me go to that back corner a bit more. That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you are. Ending Keyleth's turn, Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30, if you wanted to get there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you jumping across the river?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't even know if I'm actually jumping?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he have to leave the ground to jump across?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was actually going to walk, to be fair.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: I see what you're doing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Am I in the range of it at that point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, are you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where's the--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. You didn't see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was planning on walking, but I'm fine either way. If you make a roll for it, I'll make a dex roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a dex roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a dex save? All right. 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was it not? Just for fun, let's burn--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indomitable?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's burn a resolve.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indomitable you mean, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's reroll a save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wrote it down weirdly because I was trying to conserve space. Yeah, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a playmate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, you're one higher than that, but that's fine. Make a constitution saving throw as you get thrust up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Constitution saving throw. (counting) 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a success. You suffer 21 halved to ten points of force damage. You and Grog are now within visual range of each other, being pushed into the force field ceiling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I still have my action. There's no way I can use spider climb on the force wall, is there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I have to roll concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The silence spell. What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, same thing. 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 succeeds. It's a DC ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is. What are you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all flying now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and right myself and see if I can put my boots on and walk on the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They seem to be holding somewhat, but that's the full of your movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's fascinating. Those boots are ridiculous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Water bed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Remember when there were water beds? Good times.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those were such a pain in the ass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Terrible for your back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm still walking across this room as fast as my little feets can carry me. And I'm kind of out of low-level spells at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can cast it at a higher level, it just--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it won't be a bonus action anymore, will it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 9th-level Healing Word. Do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I do a bonus action at a higher level if I don't do a spell for my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could sacrifice a higher-level spell slot to cast a level two Healing Word as a bonus action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh. Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you'd lose a higher-level spell slot with only getting the bonuses of a level two spell. That I'll allow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is insane. I will not do that yet. No, I'll do that. I'm so down. Okay. Oh yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level do you use?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Level three. So that heals me another 12 points. Yeah man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my bonus action. Then I'll use my action to sneak out and look-- Oh wait! I can get out and around back here, right? I'll do that. And when I get out the door I'm looking around. What do I see? I see everybody floating in the air? This is crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival seems to have righted himself and his feet are actually affixed to the field and now is walking, trying to move across it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I let them go? I need help finding Vax, but I don't even know if they're on my side right now! They haven't responded to my text!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're on your side! Let me down!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to release the gravity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And with that, the gravity subsides.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I fall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you are held aloft. Grog, however, plummets to the ground for 80 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get to use the action to hit the button on the rod somewhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a reaction, you do. Where do you hit the rod? At what height?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll hit it at 20 feet above the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 feet above the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Making that Halo dive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, make a strength check. I'm working on it. Don't worry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27, yeah. You manage to hold tight. Your muscles strain from the falling impact of catching yourself there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does he immediately start doing one-arm pushups?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially, yeah. You suffer one point of damage. Rolled a one on that one. From just muscle strain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But the muscle's going to get that much bigger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it is. The muscle kind of pops out of the socket and you wrench it back in with the sheer force of your shoulder and back muscles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Micro-tears!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The water lights up for a second, suffused with some sort of magical flash and then comes back to rest. Grog, it's your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry. I'm singing. I would like to un-click the rod, actually. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You fall to the ground, taking eight points of bludgeoning damage, reduced to four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Can I run around over here? Do I see fucking anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, you know, is up there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Both totally within range. Is there a door over there that I can't see? Is there a door over on this side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On this side, the tower? Yeah, there's an opening on each side, or each corner, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I get to the door from where I am?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I go inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go inside? All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so stealthy, I've lost myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll put you down there just because you're big for the tower size.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Going assassin this time. Or thief? You were assassin last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, ending Grog's turn. Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Troll text, coming your way!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it. You are the literal worst.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know. Damn it, went to fix a typo I sent to him and it just did it again. It said "basted" instead of "hasted."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically you can't do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. So then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not as that type of action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's sending you a gif right now of Dramatic Chipmunk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was well done, Grog. I'll tell you later, but I had plans and you foiled a chunk of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, okay. There's not a lot I can do. I'm just chasing a bunch of people I can't see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can do that. Sure!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're not doing the first thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you said I couldn't do the first thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not as a hasted action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, for the love of god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, can I reverse that? I can reverse that, right? If you go back to the first thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't hold a hasted action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, but I have a regular action, right? So I'll do it on the regular action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The first thing you said?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, the first thing I said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Scanlan, Keyleth. You watch as this chamber over here, billowing fog emerges from this chamber over here. The entire outside of this room is now completely surrounded in fog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got a rogue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, sorry. Yep. Good, but, yep. I'm good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck did you just say?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On a hasted action, I can only attack. I can't cast spells, which is what I suggested. But if I just flip what I do where, I should be relatively okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but you can't hold a hasted action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I'll do the second thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That fog cloud's out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I understand, because that's not part of the second thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, is the fog cloud there or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The fog cloud's there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What am I supposed to do? Announce every move to you guys while I'm hidden? It defeats the purpose!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I tell you what I'm playing next game will you just stop this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dick, dick, dick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, it's your turn. You just watched this fog billow out from the open doorway and surround--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought you said it was out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, he means it is literally out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, out the door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no door!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is open.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The door got exploded.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the door is shattered by Grog, so you went in the chamber and fog cloud fills and encompasses the surrounding area.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I should go check that out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to hover over--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's fine, it's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First smoke. Where there's smoke, there must be a Vax, so I'm going to hover over a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, how far over?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 50 feet there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I'm going to be like, Hey boo, I recognize that spell. That's some druid shit! And then I'm going to light up the entire area with a Fire Storm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All around it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Radiating outward. Ten of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you hear this and time slows for a second. Over the earring. As you hear this small whine, this (high-pitched whine) (explosion) And it's nothing but bright light and flames around you. It completely engulfs the chamber you're in and around it. You guys watch and, I'll say this, I'm going to say it burns off the fog cloud.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So she did it inside the building?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Inside the building, all around it. So I need you to go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not worried. Hold on, say that again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's right. I'm going to use my second Luck of the day. Oh, that's good. That's real good. That's a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You've managed to dive behind where the chest was open from Grog earlier, jump into the chest, and slam it closed, just as the flames engulf the interior, burning the outside of the-- He's a little man. As it burns the exterior of the chest, you manage to avoid all damage from the spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a refrigerator?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has evasion as a rogue. If he succeeds a dexterity saving throw, he takes no damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love how cocky he is when he's like, I'm going to die!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to die! It's just, later. You three don't know shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I saw that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. As the firestorm dissipates, that chest is destroyed. You kick off the smoking bits of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At least I've taken out all y'all's health potions. That was part of the goal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're going to stay where you are?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll back up a little bit. Trying to stay away from Scanlan. Wait, what's your range?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My range is there is no getting away from me. I have a minimum range of 400 feet. There is nowhere to hide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I drop down behind the tower, could I not be seen by Percy? Fly across this way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My shitty gun has a 400-foot range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it can't go through stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it can't. Yet. I will make ghost bullets one day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would try to run up and grapple you or throw something at you, but you're made of fucking wind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's your only evasion that you have, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, man, that's unlimited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, with the rest of your movement and descending, actually you'd probably get about there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Until you get hit? You can keep doing that until-- Wait, but I thought you have one that gives you half damage and one that's all damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not telling you anything about my rules. You can figure it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you've seen Vax through the entirety of your gameplay, you'd know that if he has to make a dexterity saving throw, if he fails, he takes half damage. If he succeeds, he takes none. Or he can use his reaction to take half damage from a melee.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A reaction?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Since your husband told you, reaction is if you try to hit me with a sword, and I can only do that once per round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or any attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, melee attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah, from any melee.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Evasion is just dexterity saves. So use that information. You can use that information, Marisha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what doesn't take a dexterity save? Sending to another dimension.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's true!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still don't know how Uncanny Dodge works. "When an "attacker you can see hits you with an attack." As long as you can see them, you can reduce it by half.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I never claimed to memorize this book, people. Next campaign, I'm going to fuck it up just as much. If that bothers you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you're up. Top of the round I need you to make a constitution saving throw, because even though you're standing on the ceiling, you're still against the force.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. Constitution saving throw, let's do this. I've got a plan. I'm going to use my second resolve, or my second thing, Indomitable. Let's hope that's better. That's way better, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And now I'm going to try and do something stupid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you suffer the 11 points of force damage, reduced to five. Five points of force damage and you are not jettisoned off the force field. So it's considered rough terrain for you to move across.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's what I'm going to do. I'm going to use 25 points of my movement to run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it's rough terrain, so--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. I'm going to use my movement to run 15 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, you're just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and take a running jump to the top of the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're going to leap and release the boots? Make an acrobatics check, please. As you go and try and leap for it--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, acrobatics check. Come on, baby. That's 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23? All right, so you reduce the damage you take from the leap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a much better fall than I was going to get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would've been 18 points of bludgeoning damage, reduced to nine. Nine points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then I have to do another constitution saving throw for the silence spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Well, first from the-- You have to make it twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And another one for the impact. One was for the force field and one was for the fall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then, so I'm 23 points in. Is it worth blowing any of this? Yeah. Am I feeling the healing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, your movement dropped you outside of the circle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm going to use what little I have left--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no more movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have no more movement, even from a double-up? Using my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, if you use your action for a dash? Then you can get there, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my action for a dash to stand on the trap. Like, stand right to the trap, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well the trapdoor you blew open, so it's currently open. So you stand right at the edge of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I stand there and I'm waiting to see what the hell is going on at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, ending Percival's turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan's up. Scanlan's going to peek around the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Keyleth floating there. You see the flames burst around this interior, the fog cloud dissipates.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to throw in a Firebolt right in the front door. Wand of Fireballs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. How many?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two charges. That's 9d6.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where you at, girl?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To quote the rogue: You don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You kick off the broken chest. Right as you right yourself, a beam of red light goes into the room, explodes a second time. Make a dexterity save with a DC of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so no damage. You're like, "Oh god!" You leap out of the way and as you pull your cloak up and the cloak burns and singes on the outside, but you manage to avoid the damage as you flatten up against the wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got him, guys! He's real rough!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two fireballs in a bunker and no damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, that's your action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action, I'm going to put on Gloves of Swim/Climb. I think I got them in Pathfinder. I don't know what they are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They'll give you advantage on climbing checks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're climbing flippers?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn. Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. What's up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of your turn. The braziers on the sides of the tower burst into flame, incinerating all the space around, which affects Keyleth, who is hiding behind the side of the tower. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought the circles were going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. It's the fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fires? Did I get behind?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it. That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because the water glowed last time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dex saving throw? 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. That is 30 points of fire damage to you. As the flames subside, your wind form is burned a bit. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would it be stupid to try to grapple a wind elemental? There's not really anything to grab, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know. You hear the wind whipping around outside, but you don't see anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I step out the door? Like five feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look up immediately and see Keyleth floating there in elemental form after the flames subside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, let's just try it because fuck it. Can I use my boots of feral leaping to make a 15-foot vertical leap with a DC of 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. She's 20 feet up in the air, though. You glance up and she's 20 feet up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just too much. Could I try and climb up the side of the tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make an athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're able to get up to about her height. You're technically base-to-base with her against the side of the tower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. I'm going to leap off the tower and try to grab onto Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a grapple check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am immune to grapple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, but I want him to roll it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. What can I do in this game? Zero because you're immune to grapple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you fall through and land on the ground prone and partially in the water. You suffer eight points of bludgeoning damage, reduced to four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First blood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also notice the field that surrounds the chambers shifts in a bit. Scanlan, make a constitution saving throw. You watch as it all closes in by five feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He put a time limit on this whole thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of Grog's turn. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I've got movement, bonus action, hasted action, and my regular action. I'm going to use movement and bonus action to blast out of that door. Everybody sees me arc up into the sky and fly over this tower and disappear here. I'll tell you what happens next via text.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got a little Liam there! Liam talked!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a bottle rocket! Oh wait, nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw him disappear somewhere down below there. As far as you know, as a marker, somewhere in that area you saw Vax vanish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking flying motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. My turn. I've got a prone Grog in front of me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do something great, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, fire it up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit. But what to do? (grumbles) Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm confused by that image.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to elaborate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, what're you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, Grog. I'm going to try this one more time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it, please. End my suffering.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to land.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give me some kind of contact with another being.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You slowly descend, swirling wind arms.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to drop my form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wind form shifts out and Keyleth descends, landing right down with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Ki.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to say: Don't save against this! And I'm going to try Plane Shift! Because it fucking failed last time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the saving throw on that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mine, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but what's the saving throw?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, I need you to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No problem. Modifier is zero. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you shifting him to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have any preference on your demise?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Demise!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. Send me to the Ethereal-- no. Send me to Feywild.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. That's too nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck you! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My original plan was to teleport you to the middle of the water dimension, just have you slowly drown.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Sounds pretty awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's merciful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or my other idea was to send you to the Maze of the Abyss.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nah, water is a minute or less, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we'll go to the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, as Keyleth embraces you, there's a shifting of energy. There's a flash as you see the Divine Gate coast past you. Suddenly, you're in the dark depths of a familiar ocean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Figures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're holding your breath. You know with your constitution, you can hold your breath for a decent amount of time. As you glance down into the darkness of the shadow below you, you see movement as a series of long, familiar tentacles begin to emerge from the shadows below. You think, "Let's "make this a final, glorious way to go."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, do you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You slowly clam up as you sink down as the kraken takes you into its maw and swallows you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel so bad!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fight on!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, that doesn't feel good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't feel good to be a bully, everyone, let this be a lesson.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't feel good to be a level 20 barbarian with these strong motherfuckers. Chasing your damn tail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have movement, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have, in this form, 15 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I also don't have a Deck, for anybody that's wondering. There's no Deck of Many Things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan dropped his Reverse Gravity, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan's there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I sent a clarification.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Such a question, isn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have my bonus action still? I do, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action to turn into an earth elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it a bonus action to drop form?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh fuck, yeah. It is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll double-check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me go over there. I can't reach.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, it's a bonus action to revert, so you have to be in Keyleth form. You have 15 feet of movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use my awesome mantle which allows me to jump.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your strength?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your strength score?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just my modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your strength score.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My strength score is 14, so I have plus two to my strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the distance you can jump in feet is your strength score. So triple that, you can jump pretty far.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me jump behind there. Do I have enough, with the rest of my movement, can I get inside this building?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that would be part of your movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'll stay there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Finishing Keyleth's turn, Percival, you're up. You heal 20 hit points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counting) Do I see Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm down for that. That's a terrible roll. That's 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's not hiding, so you do see the very edge of her. He has an eyeline to the very edge of you. That's as far as you can get with your movement. She has three-quarters cover.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That doesn't matter to me. How far away is she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're eyeballing maybe about 45, 50 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make a toss, try and nail her in the head. It's got a range of 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does. Make a ranged attack roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take me out to the ball game!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take me out to the-- what's after that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The crowd.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The crowd!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a good throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keyleth, as you're ducking around, you hear this faint shout in the distance of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Manners! Oh, you don't! Does it work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have Freedom of Movement, too, cast on me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Too late!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the band expands and wraps around Keyleth's body, you watch as she quickly slips out of the bindings and the chains fall to the ground before reverting back to a sphere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's amazing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fucking oh my god! That was clutch!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was so good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Only because you remembered, holy shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would have been bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just saw that happen, didn't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank god for that fucking 4th-level spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was really scary. That was my attack. I'm going to back off and then go back to the center of that tower and sit and try to get three-quarters cover over there. I want to stay in the green light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Percival's turn, Scanlan, you're up. You can see Keyleth from around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull out of that side there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to dash right towards Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dash?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, just run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your movement there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far away am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's about 35, 40 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So more than 30?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: More than 30, correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck you! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35 feet, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Goddamn it! All right, I mean I'll just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A barbarian's world.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, changing my mind, seeing if this works. What is the save?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Only when we reach level 20, boys, only when we reach level 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wisdom? She's so wise!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, a wise guy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Early game druids kind of suck, later games, kind of boss.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's not immune to charm, though. I've already charmed her once. Yeah, fuck it. One more thing to check, sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam, 20 levels and you haven't got your spells in order?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a brand new spell, I've never used it! What's the range? It's 30 feet, great. I will Dominate Person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dominate Person for Keyleth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's not going to work because she's super wise, but I'll try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you need to make a wisdom saving throw. You have advantage because you are a half-elf, so you have advantage against charm effects.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh shit, with her wisdom? Good luck, buddy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do I have to save? 22?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me do the math really quick. Yeah, I'm all right. I rolled a natural 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, Scanlan, she resists the spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine. As my bonus action I will say to her: That spell was an inspiration and we're still on the same team, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel so bad I had to teleport Grog away, but I'm still looking for Vax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, me too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn. The field shimmies and crunches even closer. You watch as this distant building begins to collapse inward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh wow, Matt. Oh wow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you turn it in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That door's destroyed.

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Stay turnt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The portal's gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, two squares in all around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two squares in all around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm in. When we get four we actually start to remove rock blocks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's up? Who's next?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use my 120 feet of regular movement to fly out of my hiding place into the air. This is probably half my movement, right about there. I can't see, about there. Don't worry, this is temporary. I wouldn't do that. I see Percival, Scanlan, Keyleth. I've used half my movement about, I would guess. And I'm going to use my bonus action to use Vow of Enmity on Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as you suddenly turn and look up into the sky as you see, giant wings unfolded, Vax points down at you and with a giant earth-shattering caw in the sky of a raven cry, you feel this mark penetrate your chest, as he marks you with his Vow of Enmity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to fly within 60 feet of her using still my base movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are about 60 feet here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will use my regular paladin attack, which is an attack-attack, to attack her. Which is at advantage because of the Vow of Enmity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not great. I'm going to use a Luck. I'm going to use a Luck. That's better. Not much better. That is a 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, so here we go, just a little bit, though. A tickle for you, really. (counting) 28 and that's the first attack and then the second attack--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total of 28 on that one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 28, yeah, total.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 28 what damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 28 damage. That was a combo, there was some psychic, there was eight of psychic. Okay, then the second attack is 25 to hit, which also hits, but it's much dinkier. So that is eight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight. That's 36 total.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll use my haste so I can go another 60 feet and I'm going to fly about there. Then I'm going to use my regular action to-- you guys don't fucking know. I will tell you where I'm using my bonus action to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry. What? You moved over, used your paladin action to attack twice--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Attack, attack for paladin action, and I still have a hasted action and a bonus action. One can be used for more movement--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you moving somewhere with one of your actions? Is what I'm asking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 60 feet. Another 60 feet-ish for the base movement to there. Everybody thinks I don't know what I'm talking about!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I know. I need clarification because they need to know where you ran off to. They still see you. You're still out in the open.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So my base movement gets me to probably about here, and I use my paladin attack to attack twice, right? So I've got bonus action and a hasted action left. That is 120 feet left on one, and then I can use the bonus action to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so excited for the new campaign.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know! (laughter) Me too!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is my own fault.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a great character planned! I can't wait, but I know that I can use another 120 feet from here to get to there, there, there, or there and a bonus action to hide. It's all in the fucking book dudes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your movement is 120 feet, which got you to there, right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Paladin action which is attack-attack, and I still have hasted action which can be used for movement--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do it. Text me where you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're doing your job. It's just a process to work out for the scenario of this type of event.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey man, send a message to Mike Mearls about the 5th edition handbook. Thanks, Mike Mearls, I love the handbook.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay, everyone hates me tonight, so were all in the same boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, ending Vax's turn, Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got shanked twice with two daggers after the Vow of Enmity and watched your Vax vanish off somewhere in-- which direction?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The last anyone saw me is here. Keyleth saw me here going in this direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watched him vanish that way right behind the tower. What are you doing, Keyleth? Percy, you're on deck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Isn't Plane Shift concentration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plane Shift? I don't believe it is. It just happens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: l will look, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Banishment is concentration, that's probably what you were thinking of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't have any concentration spells up either.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just meant if you get hit--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In case you come back. Let me actually check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're fine. What you got?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck, I hope this doesn't fuck up. Peek around the corner. Do I see Scanlan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. This whole time you see Scanlan running up to you and telling you all this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Sure. I'm going to peek around, see Scanlan and be like: Hey, buddy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You see Vax?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was a blur. Came over, shot at you, and left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool, good to know. Feeblemind!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit! Counterspell level six!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fail. Well, you still have to roll for it. Feeblemind level eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Feeblemind is an 8th-level spell. Go ahead and roll-- (laugh) Okay, hold on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah wait, the range is 30 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She moved five feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She did move up to peek, she said.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Range for Feeblemind is 150 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, 60-foot range for Counterspell, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, It says range 60, it's used as a reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah I know, doesn't matter either way. All right, for you it's a Counterspell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I should've backed up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you should've moved. It's all good. I need you to make an ability check using your spellcasting ability, so a charisma check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what does he have to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what? No. Counterspell is ten plus the level, wait, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to roll a check and add your charisma bonus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got it. So that's 13 plus six is 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. You need to beat 18 DC because it's an 8th-level spell you said?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He needs to beat an 18. Counterspelled Feeblemind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You rolled a 19?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as she goes to cast Feeblemind you recognize the incantation from when she used it on Raishan and you go--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go: Verily you are-- bad person!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the Feeblemind fades--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! I should've fucking been out of range!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're both making mistakes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're both really good!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I respect you so much!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do too. We're making stupid mistakes because we're so anxious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we're so good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We really are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're great. And then I'm going to go to my earth elemental form. I've still got shit to do. I'm going to use my movement. Can I jump back over and run behind the tower this way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the movement of your elemental again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 30 feet. This way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) That's as far as you can get right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Instead of curving around, can I just go straight away from the blue thing? Just in case the blue thing hurts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's that? You want to go around and look?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Instead of curving, can I just go further from the blue thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remember it's two points in at this point.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN, LIAM
lines.text: (singing) What's that blue thing doing there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man, we did grow up in that era, didn't we? Oh, that brought it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Last turn when the fields shattered, it did cause the lighting to go off. I forgot to mention that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What lighting?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The blue?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The one Scanlan was next to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Last round both of you were out of range so I didn't mention it. I forgot about it in the process, I was focusing on the field.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The blue thing went.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So the circle is up next.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly. So are you staying in the water?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll put you there. At the end of Scanlan's turn--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was Keyleth's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, Keyleth. You watch as the water and the two chambers flash and the chamber crushes even further. This is partially destroyed. And now you're seeing-- we're using this as a marker-- it's starting to accelerate the destruction in the interior. Pushing this in here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's about to get real on the field back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would Colville do this to us? He's a kind and gentle lord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using that as a mark. That falls back to this partially destroyed there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. All this work destroyed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. All righty. Vax, sorry, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get up right over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm confused. The field should happen later this round, but we'll get to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm getting up over here on this point of the tower and I'm holding my action until I see even the slightest fucking little black feather appear anywhere on this field and I'm going to lay goddamn waste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Ending Percival's turn, Scanlan, your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I run after Keyleth and I say: Wait I forgot! Feeblemind. I will use Wish to cast Feeblemind on her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, I need you to make an intelligence saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just straight intelligence? Do I get anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever your intelligence saving throw is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As the earth elemental? I keep my mental stats, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, because it's Wild Shape you keep your mental stats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not that that means anything. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow. I mean he had to get clutch, didn't he?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Drop that motherfucker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to make sure that I don't have any type of weird resistance--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To impossible to defeat spells? (groaning)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Terrible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll 4d6 psychic damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's the king for a reason you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He tried to do what he did to me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 11 points of psychic damage, Keyleth. Your intelligence and charisma scores become one. You cannot cast spells, activate magic items, understand language or communicate in any intelligible way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I take how many? 11 psychic damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I'm at 115.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's changed things, hasn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a swing cast right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're still a player.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't count me out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's now just a barbarian.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you shift into things?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I'm currently shifted.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She can't unshift.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Casting a spell isn't considered a part of Wild Shape.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wild Shape is not casting a spell, it's an ability. She can still Wild Shape.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She can still fucking Wild Shape every turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's an inherent druid nature ability, it's not a spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you know to do that in a frenzy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a frenzy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who, me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. I'll duck somewhere so she can't see me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say you got that far. Do you move in there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said Feeblemind has a super long range, right? I didn't move at all. I'm going to move back over this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll put you there. It's my fault for moving you. That finishes Scanlan's turn. Now the field crushes in where it should've before. That was my fault for doing it out of turn. Also, the flames burst around the chamber. Percival, where are you right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just inside, over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You duck out of the way as the flames--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm keeping an eye out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Vax's turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I need to ask a question. Here it comes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My phone's starting to get low on battery.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm plugged in by a computer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good. Even better. That's 33 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, what's your armor class?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 18. That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Steps and is throwing daggers from the trap door. He's inside the tower and rushed up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This means I get to take my attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. After his first attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 38 on the first. Does he attack between my two daggers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's his reaction. He hits as soon as your first attack hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 38 on the first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 38 points of piercing damage to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Some of it's psychic, but who's counting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, no. You'd finish your action, which is your attack action, and then he does all of his.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good. 25. That hit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will dump venom into it. You have to succeed a DC 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Like 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine. As you throw both daggers, you watch as Percival spins around with-- which weapon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to use Animus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With Animus and goes for his four attacks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bring it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do real attacks because this is my real--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you were holding your action. You can spend any grit you've got.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is sharpshooter. No, he's hard to hit the first time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't have that. Remember, Kerr took away his cloak a long time ago.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool. Sharpshooter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was going to say I peeked up, but he's sharpshooter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sharpshooter plus I'm going to do deadeye because I really want to hit this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've only got four chances.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That crits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll use my last Luck. You have to reroll the 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I can. On attacks, yes I can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's checking if you do it before the roll or not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it's my last Luck, so your next three are clear. Absolutely can you use Luck on other people's stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am calling it now: Keyleth still wins.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I can't remember if it's my third Luck or fourth, so we're just going to call it my fourth Luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You roll a d20 and choose whether.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a two!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the first attack misses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The first attack just misses? He can just negate it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gets to choose whether you take his roll or yours. He rolled a two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got three more shots. Of course you're going to shoot me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's twist again like we did last summer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good old 11 Lucks Vax.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 26 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, that hits. I'll use Uncanny Dodge on this one since I can see him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 1d10 plus 1d6 psychic, which is three, four, five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First blood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where's my brain? That's 23 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 11.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My third hit. Here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spending another grit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm spending another grit. Yeah, it'll be no fun. No, I'm not going to spend another grit. Still sharpshooter. That's 23 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just hits!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm rolling so poorly. 20 points of damage, plus five psychic, so 25.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's first blood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't spend an action surge in this round, can I? On a held action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On your turn is how it happens. Double check for you, but I'm pretty sure. On your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got one more shot. Come on. Draw blood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use Thunderwave instead of shooting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thunderwave is an action, it's not an attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Same thing. 15, so that hits. 26 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Definitely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 24 points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gotcha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your reaction. That ends your attacks. You can take the rest of your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Question. Is the green beam still there? Does it do anything? Are you going to tell me later? Just throwing it out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can feel the warmth around you, but it's not doing anything immediately. You have to start your turn there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right back down. That was-- okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I have to roll to see if I keep my spell. Con save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 succeeds on the first one. Roll again for the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still maintain it. That finishes Vax's turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see Vax at all? Probably not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not see Vax at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action to turn into a water elemental and swan dive into the water. Then I'm going to swim over to the edge of the pond where Scanlan is. 90 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep. I'm going to come out of the water and I'm--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How does she know where I am?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You fucking Feebleminded! I can still see, motherfucker! I still have eyes! I'm going to come out of the water and I'm going to attempt to whelm him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that even mean? Not overwhelmed, just whelmed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whelm. Make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A strength saving throw. Okay. These aren't good. 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Failure!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I Cutting Words? No, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's your own check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's an attack. You take 2d8 bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can Cutting Words to reduce the damage if you'd like to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 11 plus four, so 15 damage. You are grappled and unable to breathe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I still have movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You have about 30 feet of movement left. Probably about 20, since you did use some of your movement to get into the water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's okay. I just want to take my grapple with him and my whelm and take him back under into this creek.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can hit, grab, and pull all on one action?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whelm. It's my ability. I'm basically a big elemental and you're stuck inside of me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But like, Bigby's Hand can either hit or grab, not hit and grab and pull.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bigby's Hand is not a beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a different effect, unfortunately. Let me see here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I forgot to bleed you. Damn. It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you are restrained and unable to breathe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And she's pulling me away?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, you're stuck inside of me until further notice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because you're whelmed and he's a tiny gnome, yeah. So you pull him into the water. So you're in her space currently, inside Keyleth's elemental form, unable to get out and pulled under the water. Keyleth, does that end your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm now under the water, hiding with Scanlan inside of my belly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should check hoo-ha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm checking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I assume, because he's got five billion feet of range, that he is long gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that he is not just beyond that door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool. I'm going to shift to the other side of the tower, stay in the healing range, and hold my goddamn-- I'm going to run over here, stay in the little green light, hold my fucking action until I see feather. I'm up and ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn, Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And do I heal, since I'm in the green?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The green has to be inside the center circle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In that case, I'll use my bonus action to down a healing potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did the green beam do anything for me or did it not work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to start your turn in the beam in order to get the effect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Can I use verbally-based spells?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We said previously that you can still cast underwater.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Then I will cast underwater and cast Dimension Door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, I knew he was going to do that!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does he have to be able to talk in order to do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We just asked that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We previously established in the kraken battle that you guys were able to cast spells underwater. That continues here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will, since I don't know where I am, I will bamf to a place that I do know, which is-- where would I go? Let's go to the room across the water over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Inside the room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, closer to the water's edge, but yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there we go. All right. At the end of your turn, the field crushes in further. It's now moving faster and faster, moving ten feet at a time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the end.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) My only friend, the end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, the lightning towers would go off, but they do not because they have been slowly crushed and destroyed, eaten by the field.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The blue? Does that mean it skips?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I will use a bonus action to dump all my Lay on Hands back into myself. So that's the first thing. And I will--

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Bless you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I will fucking stay put. Then I'll tell you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth, your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's my turn already? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The numbers are getting down and half the party's just staying in place, doing nothing, so your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Especially one of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I pop my head out of the water. Do I see anybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, no. You are alone on the battlefield.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to switch to an earth elemental. I'm going to come out of the water. I'm going to walk over to the edge of the tower. I'm going to be like, fuck whoever's in this shit! And go boom, and start bringing this tower down with my Siege Monster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an attack against the tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have to roll to hit still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First attack, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 hits. It's an easy-to-hit tower. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that's 2d8 plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get two slam attacks?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Much better than that. It was a natural 12, so plus eight. So 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Percival, you feel this impact on the tower. What's going on? (impact) As the back half of it begins to crumble and collapse backwards.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I can't use any of my held action to run, because that was not my intention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's all falling apart at this point, which works fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck all y'all! I'm stupid and angry!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Regardless, my reaction will be to run away from where it's falling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, this is all just falling down. There is a little bit of this that's still hanging on there. Large portion of the tower is collapsed and is unusable. Percival, you crumble and slide off and fall into the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shoes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. You're attaching to it as it falls so go ahead-- Are you just staying onto it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm holding on for dear life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you do not make an acrobatics check and it crumbles beneath you. The rocks begin to grind and tear into you as you fall in with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so I wouldn't try and dodge? I don't get a dodge for any of that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not if you're adhering to it and it collapses inward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just trying to be safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's falling back and then crumbling inwards.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, no, no, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, sorry, yeah. I thought it was like surfing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were for a moment, and then it all collapsed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Acrobatics check? Come on. Oh yeah! 28!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28? Okay, yeah. So you manage to only suffer four points of bludgeoning damage and you land, not prone, as you ride it down and are standing there on the side, with an angry earth elemental now slamming into the sides of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25 constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth, you do suffer 22 points of bludgeoning damage from the tower pieces collapsing down upon and around you. Reduced by half, because you're an earth elemental.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I see Vax at any point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I see Scanlan at any point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, yeah, you would see Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I take my shots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three. Four! Ha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He sees me?! Through all that fucking rubble?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, he rode it down to the ground and made an acrobatics check to stop, and you're not hidden.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A misfire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a misfire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first shot's a misfire. Scanlan, don't give up yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
