lines.text: That's 92 now, is what I'm at. And then, fuck Animus. I'm going to the Retort gun for the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you swap out to Retort. Second attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, boo!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Retort's down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes to fire, (fizzling). Pulls the second gun, (misfire).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hold up my gun and say, Need one, motherfucker?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't hear you. And I pull out my last shot. This is my last shot because I've burned everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is Bad News?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. And that's, come on, don't do this to me. Oh, at least it's a hit. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. Scanlan, what's your AC?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to Cutting Words that with my little taunt and reduce it by--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't hear him, but okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's true. Never mind. Well, then I'll Cutting Words the damage. You can do that, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think the target of the attack has to be the target of the Cutting Words. Because yeah, it reduces the damage because you fuck with them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, then you hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not going to be a bad hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're all bad hits. Massive hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was so good!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 29 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? "Use your wit to confuse-- a creature that you can see within 60 feet of you "makes an attack roll."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically, I guess he could do a visual thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let you do it. So before you put the damage down, go ahead and roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to have to be a really good roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a d12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's a d12! I've been doing d8s this whole time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: d12, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's even worse!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so take the damage. The shot blasts into your shoulder. You see the blood erupt from you. You've been hit by this before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ow! Ow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you not realize?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm using a Sharpie, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Too late now, anyway! Yeah, I know, it's like, we might as well burn it. We're burning it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, that ends your turn? Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, I mean, no, that's not my turn. That was my reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, because Keyleth brought it down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, so it's Keyleth's turn. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, because you were waiting--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was holding my attack until I saw people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Okay. So that brings us to the top of the round. Percy, it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?! He can hold three attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, he held his action to attack as soon as he saw somebody, and he saw you and Keyleth. He attacked you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And one attack is three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four attacks. A 20th-level fighter, it's their thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's what fighters do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just barely fixed my gun. Barely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's your action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And now I'm going to do an action surge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you fixed which one? Animus?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to shoot me eight times!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shot number one with grit, because I'm a little nervous about this. 26. I didn't call sharpshooter, so I'm just going to call that 31 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits. 1d10 plus 1d6. That was terrible. 11 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next attack? Second?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Attack number two is 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's better. 17 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will Cutting Words. Top of the round, I get my reaction back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hasn't come back to your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I'm dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan goes unconscious with that second hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool. I still have two attacks? I'm going to take my movement to run over to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shove a healing potion in his mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's as far as I can go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's water and you're walking through water right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That water freaks me out. I don't want to quite step in that water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you could stay up, over here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, just over there. Keep me up on the little bit because I don't want Keyleth to see me, because she's scary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, she can see you. You're not hiding from her. She's this giant behemoth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I would like to curl a little bit then out of her range of vision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're out of movement right there. That's as far as you will get.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know exactly where you are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she can sense it. She feels the footfalls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have two more shots? All right, I'm taking a shot-- actually, unconscious, I don't get grit back? It's death I get grit back. All right, so, taking another-- but when he dies I get a grit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He's prone, technically, so you have disadvantage on the attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, well then, hm. Fuck it, then. I'll hold my attacks and use my bonus action to do a heal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, on me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, so I'm done. I'm just getting my 1d10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, I need you to make a death saving throw, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's one success. Keep that in mind. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 22 back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we'll say there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's 194. I'm back up to 194.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, the water, which is now filled with bits of broken stone, however still sets off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why I didn't step in it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So from my hidden position, I would like to use ten or 15 feet of movement, whatever I would need to peek out and throw Whisper at Percival's face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How would he even know where I am?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I would peek out. I'm looking around and I know that I would see you. I was in here and I'm hidden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you were hidden until you attacked, which revealed you there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Isn't it a sneak attack from a hidden position?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is just for placement. I want to put you on the field once or twice this battle!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know! So I'm using Whisper. That's good, that's a 25 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll bamf to him as I do it. It's sneak attack damage. That is nine plus that is 11. Plus all these guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: None of this is magic, is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Some of it's psychic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, all the big spellcasters are either down or can't cast spells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That definitely hits. That is a 31. Right. So not a lot of damage, though. (counting) That's 15 of damage. That was maybe 15 feet of movement, paladin attack-attack and I say: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you bamf to her as well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disengage. You guys don't know where I went.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You disengaged?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what I would have done on the third attack? First blood. You did a lot of nothing damage to both of them and then hid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see Percy? Oh wait, I can feel him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can feel him, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll never win, Vax! Scanlan from the grave!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to point out, by the way, I don't think I've actually attacked you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Just saying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you thinking that's going to save you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm making plans.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do I want to do with you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is a question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is such a question. What's next? Next is the fire, right? Oh. Hang on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, top of your turn. You feel two footfalls very gently in the rubble on the other side of the tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I make my way to them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your movement here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here's the question. Since I know kind of where he is, can I use my bonus action to turn into a fire elemental and go to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do that. My fire elemental movement is 50 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She looks like she's about to fire a mortar into a compound.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, moving 50 feet, through the rubble, since you can move through small spaces, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I already called it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to do water elemental, you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I already called it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were hiding up in the rubble.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not where I am. I just sent it to you. You asked me and I told you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sent me two pictures.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You asked for clarification. I give it to you. So no one would see me as you put me where I am. Why would she be able to go in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She knows exactly where you are and as a fire elemental, she can dodge between cracks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did she run out of movement, though?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have 50 feet, yo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kill me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So pouty!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I knew it was going to happen!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're sitting there hiding, there's a bright light and there's a slight crevasse between the rocks as a flaming burst of fire elemental Keyleth emerges to assault you. What're you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm doing both attacks at once here. First attack is 22.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack doesn't hit either, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She swipes with one fire claw, you barely dodge out of the way. A second one hits the stone behind you as you duck low.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But he's on fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you're on fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tonight in this game.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have any more movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have five feet of movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I move through this crack on the other side here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, boom mics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the rubble and everything in here... Ending Keyleth's turn, Percival, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm making a mad dash for Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (counting)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't make a jump to see if I can get a little further across there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your strength?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My strength sucks. My strength is 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You jump and land. You're up to your chest in water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use the rest of my action to continue to run towards Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to use an action to dash?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Use an action to dash. Can I get a little further, or is that as far as I can get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe five more feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to be on the other side of him, if that's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get to there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan. Death saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine. That's two successes. The field crushes in further. Slowly pushing in. At this point, by the way, so you're aware, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought I had a little bit of room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me use this to mark it here. That's where it's closing in. Closer and closer. Vax, your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, when is it the top of the round?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just went. That was Percival.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did the torches go, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they go after Scanlan's turn, now, the field. You're right. Thank you for the reminder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, look at that!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I'm totally helping the DM.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you're killing Vax! Well done!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right. I get advantage. 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a success. You take no damage because of evasion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ballsacks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it my turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm separated with a wall from her a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slight gap in the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to skitter five or ten feet. I know she can hear me, but he can't. Then I'm going to use a little more movement. This looks like a hole, so I'll floof out to about here. I'll paladin attack-attack Percival from the air over the water. Yeah. Oh, that's not very good. That's 18.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my armor class.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (counting) 40.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40 points of piercing damage to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One attack hit, one missed. I used bonus action to hide, a little bit of movement to get here, attack-attack. So I have hasted action and a lot more movement left. I'll use the rest of my base movement to go. I will tell you where I'm going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to heal me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Vax's turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Blue, that's gone. I know he's around here somewhere, yeah? Over around this side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. You felt a little (clicking).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I jump into the water and swim around as a water elemental and see if I can get to this other side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn into a water elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This might not be the best call. If I get around here, can I poke my head up and see if I find him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have to wait to find out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just projected where I was going to be, though, he could just change his fucking mind!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just the nature of the game, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't sext him while you're at it! Jesus!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The new campaign will be all texts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to remain fire elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I was jumping into water elemental to go around, but if I don't feel him land, then I'll go earth elemental. Let me start stomping up and over and seeing what I see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. I'll let you step up over rough terrain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (grumbling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dashing through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Do I see anything? Do I see any flying asshole rogues?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's my only mechanic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a good mechanic!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my action surge. I'm going to hold my action, but I'm going to use my action surge. I can use an action surge instead of holding my action. Just to stab this fucker three times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Brutal!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first attack. Roll an attack with advantage because he's on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm prone. I get half!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only against ranged attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. It's an auto-crit. You fail two death saving throws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here goes the second one. 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, you shank Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh look, I get a grit back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan bleeds out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who will tell my story?

lines.name: TALIESIN, TRAVIS
lines.text: Not me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not proud of this. I'm never telling anyone. I'm like: I don't know, he ran off. I am going to move out into this direction over here because I know the walls are caving in. I have 30 movement. I'm going to move right over here to start getting out of the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over where?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Around the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wall's up against there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counting) I'm holding my action for the second I see anyone start to fuck with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You already used your action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was my action surge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. Action surge first. You hold your action in case you see anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do a lot of damage now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of Percival's turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just have to bet that I can plow damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The water bursts with magical energy. No, it was fire last time, so now it's lightning. Blue things are gone, nothing happens. Also, it crushes in once more. Bringing us to there. Currently, the walls have crushed in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I always knew it would be the three of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. I just always wanted to say that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You always said it would be Grog and Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I thought it was going to be me and Grog again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With all the magic that I have?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you had gotten your hands on anybody--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, if you had closed the gap, that's it. That's down for any of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Disengage. Shift. Element. You just (poof) right out of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And also, can I mention, isn't he still on fire? Make it harder to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt. One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One. Okay. So, couple things. One, roll 1d10 fire damage, Marisha, by the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Lead him out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically twice, since you didn't do it last turn, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was about to say, I didn't stop drop and roll or anything. Literally about to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action to put it out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so I didn't do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, nine fire damage, and then roll again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So nine now, and then another four. So, 13.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 13. Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then you fail your constitution saving throw as the wall slams into you, pushing you back. Oof. You take 28 points of force damage, and you are thrown, prone onto the ground right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends that turn. Vax, your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I will use movement to get up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half your movement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Half my, 60 feet of movement to stand up, got it. And I will fly low along the ground--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also Vax--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are the boots off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The boots are off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So it's not 60, the wings are up, so 30 feet to get up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, thank god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 30 feet to get about-- I don't know, can I perch there? Flying low? I should be within 60 feet of Kiki, and I have Vow of Enmity still, so I will attack-attack-attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can barely see her. You just barely have her in range. Percy. You watch as he glides in the air--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, hey, I got a shot!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is here, this is here. There's a gap there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, but you wouldn't have flown up to your perch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will take my shot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Out of the shadows, boy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody hates me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody hates each other!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First shot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As the internet said earlier, we're really bad at shit-talking each other. Just embrace it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First shot, I'm burning my grit for a Sharpshooter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's been Feebleminded! Don't play Woe is Me!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Going to burn my grit for a Sharpshooter in hopes of really doing some damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He got Plane Shifted, he got shanked by Percival! You're doing all right!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First time we've seen you in three hours and 45 minutes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That probably hits a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First blood!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here, I'm using good dice for this. Oh yeah. 28 plus six psychic, so 34 points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can use Uncanny Dodge on that, since I can see him if he can see me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, half that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Half of 34.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be 17. Next attack?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Next attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on, Gil.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that a crit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's not a crit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it, so close.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 27 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you're good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where are my dice for that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not that I'm cheering on for your death or anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just excited. I'm excitable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 26 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't use a bonus to reload, can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. Not your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I just reloaded. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So your last attack is to reload.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cast Slowly Decompose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I cast Waterlogged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so now you land there, and can make your attacks on him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's still my turn. Oh, wow, that's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. That was his reaction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dagger dagger dagger. Yeah, that's a 30 to hit. Oh, it doesn't matter, because I've got Vow of Enmity up. I was going to say am I still hidden, but I've got Vow of Enmity. That is sneak attack on that. That's 30.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Scanlan! We could have been pit fiends together! But I got Feebleminded! Oh no! And you died! We waited too long!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I had these minions at the ready, just in case!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aww!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were going to be awesome!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That would've been fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. Pit fiend on a full melee round against a single target can do an average of 115 hit points of damage and lock down healing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 44 on the first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 44 damage on the first? Does 18 hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Pretty much everything hits these motherfuckers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You get ten on that. 28 on the third, also hits. That is 12 on the third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've used all your movement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Paladin attack-attack and bonus to do a third attack. So I'm done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ker-splash. Then use my movement speed to come up. I'm going to try to whelm Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A leap there would be 20 feet of movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With my dope mantle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's not so dumb that she thinks she's an earth elemental forever?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm an archdruid!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have an intelligence of one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, technically your mantle isn't on you right now because you're in elemental form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beast Shape says that anything that's on me absorbs into me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Absorbs into your form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And elemental is my form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you're not getting your ring of protection bonus, you're not getting your other elements that you have in physical form. They stay within you so when you transform back, the effects return, but you don't get the Jump ability. What's the strength of this guy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20 strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Suddenly, five rules lawyers around the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Water elemental there. I'll say half your movement to get into the water, the jump. Turn into a water elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much speed do I have left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half of your swim speed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So 45. Can I get to Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, difficult terrain!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can swim! I'm a fucking water elemental!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just in melee range with him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Blub blub blub! Whelm again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have to move into his space for whelm?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's unfortunately just out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'll do my two slam attacks. Bam bam.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's low, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just out of range for being whelmed, so that's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Weirdly, taking away all of Keyleth's intelligence has made her a more effective fighter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20. Misses. I've got to roll high in order to actually get you. That's even better! 25!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll, baby! 17 points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Uncanny dodge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So casual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take eight points of bludgeoning damage from the water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and fix my gun with my roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is your action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And boy that does it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's so fixed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sometimes it'll really break. I'm going to make my way up on top of that tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. A little closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just so you know, the force field is right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, never mind. I thought it was a little further back. I'm going to try to cross the water and get back to the other side of the water again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) Right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do it. Just let the two of them settle their differences.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not a bad call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, the energy fields burst with purple energy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was so hoping I was going to have Vax in that water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, they don't! They've been destroyed by the fields, so they do not have an effect any more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just us kids.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which saves you because that would have knocked out your form. However, the fields move in further, completely destroying this here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am so excited by this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to be dead. I'm a dead man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This all goes away. Just the edge of the water now. We're in on this area now. Vax, it's your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to paladin attack Keyleth with Vow of Enmity twice. The first one is a natural 20. Let's just calculate that, shall we? That's one. Get all the dice first. (counting) Not that great, actually. That is 58 for the first attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 58 damage to your water elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is that magical? No, it's straight damage, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight psychic and double on all the dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Magical dagger attacks, so you do not resist.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was the first one, 56?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not right, either! No, that is right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't see Percival.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was the other one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't be done! Don't you get it? The math's not there! You have to deliver more than 200 points of damage in a single round to kill her! You can't do it without us! The math is not there!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that was paladin attack-attack. I'll use disengage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fly into the wall. Do it. Burn yourself up, every inch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to do the phone thing. I'm going to fly 60 feet, but Percy doesn't see me. She does. I fly to about here. 60 feet. I'm on the other side of this tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You disengaged from her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disengage and then my movement of 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends Vax's turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here she comes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep! I'm going for that motherfucker right there!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy would have shot me out of it. I stay low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, on that side, there is no water there. This is all gone. This has all been eaten away. You'd have to get up onto the land there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then let me go earth elemental and walk on over to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move partially.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Total? I can't get any further?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. With a 30 feet speed for an earth elemental, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as close as you can get.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn? You still have an action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's nothing I can do as an earth elemental with Feeblemind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your action to dash towards him if you wanted to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. I'll get right up in his face. I can't grapple him? I can't do anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The field's up against there, so technically he had to fly around and land.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it just this island left now, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, wait. Is it all the way up into here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If that's the case, can I do an air elemental and fly over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, you can do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This system's a little confusing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, my apologies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're doing great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're vamping.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In that case, let me do a fire elemental, if that's okay, and then I'll go 50 feet. I've got 50 feet of movement and I can move through one-inch spaces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can just get up to where he is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get in his space and catch him on fire immediately?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's already on fire still.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's your third try at a form, dude.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you still on fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I have rolled again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should have taken damage last turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm probably down, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you land--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can burn him out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's smoldering on the ground. You go over to where Vax is, and he's just burning. His unconscious body is burning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go: Hey, Scanlan, I found him! I found Vax! Scanlan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look over and see on the field that's pushing forward, there's a Scanlan corpse being rolled as it shoves him closer onto the battlefield.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First! Blood!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there water? The water's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The water's over here. We'll put you there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can still attack him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The corpse? Yeah, you can. Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought you used all your shit to get there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I just walked there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Grog just suffocated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nah, he's got constitution for days. He's got five more minutes on this shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do I have to roll to hit him, by the way? He's down and unconscious, so do I have to roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's two death saves per.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Melee, you have advantage to attack him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going to dodge sleeping.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're literally sitting on him. You're going to burn him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, both of my attacks hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His body incinerates.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just sit on him, I'm like: Sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, each time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, each time and she hit him twice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hit him twice. So Vax's body burns away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm two out of three. She's got to hit me one more time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that was just the first hit? I thought you hit him with both.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hit him twice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, so the first one's two. Peace!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both attacks. You're incinerated.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm a little fucked, but we'll see how this goes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A little?! You. Can't. Win!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, boo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I see her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm casting Hex. I'm taking three shots from where I'm standing with Animus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not four?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four sharpshooter. Number one is 19 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hit. I'm really easy to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh shit, that's pretty good. That's 27 normal points of damage. Five psychic and five necrotic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So 37 total?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the first one, is it piercing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Piercing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which I take half of because it's not magical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is magical because you're shooting with Animus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is magical damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So 37 total? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shot number two. Come on, man, this is all I need. Fucking fuck fuck. I take two psychic damage as it jams. I'm jamming a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm jamming!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shot number three is Bad News, which is not magic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We jamming!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not awesome because you take half damage because it's piercing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First blood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's 26 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus d6 necrotic. So 13.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus one necrotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run up the tower. No, straight up the tower. Spider boots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, there's fire there. You get there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to get out of the way of the fire when it finally rolls. Trying to get inside of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you get to the middle and stay there until the whole island kills her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I can do that too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of Percy's turn. The field crushes in even further, which unfortunately does hit you, Keyleth. You get pushed in. Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a straight con save? Don't fuck me, Gil. That's good. 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20, okay. You do succeed. So you take, wow that's a good roll. Six, six, six, six, five, two, four. No, against you. 29 divided, so that's 14 points of force damage. You're now being crushed into the rubble and pushed up the top of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you say she's jamming? Into the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's jamming pretty hard into that wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whose turn is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is the field's turn over. It's Keyleth's turn. You're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, what did the field just do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's crushing you guys inward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did it do the torch or did the torch already happen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The torch unfortunately could not because the territory that it would be on-- I mean, the torch goes off, I would say, but you're immune to fire and Percival's out of the way, and only part of it is currently available. It's crushing it very tight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool. Cool cool cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you took damage from the force field.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's your turn, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go earth elemental.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or, if I can get to Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You won't get to him with your movement, unfortunately, because there's a lot of rubble in the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I can't jump over it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, but your movement-- You can't jump more than you can move when you don't have the cloak on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I within ten feet of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's about 15 feet from you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! Okay. That's it, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Percival, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and fix my gun because it's the only chance I have. Oh, just barely makes it. Yep. And then, since I don't have an attack, man, there's nothing I can do. I'm going to run on the outskirts on the outside of the tower, behind, and get some cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, on the wall. I'm literally on the wall. It won't crush next round, will it? I mean, at current rate, I'm not doing anything dumb? I mean, I would know, though, if it's been going at--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that, on this side, it will, but not on this side--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now keeping tabs on where it lies. There is the edge. There, and then on this side, it's right up against you, Percival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's cramming!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I move five feet to reach him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You can get up on top there and bash downward, essentially.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He still has a decent amount of hit points, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but you can draw

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is a force wall. If I throw him into it, it's going to suck?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not that bad. I've hit it three times already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, him and Grog have been thrown into it a few times earlier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Crush him!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, can I grapple him and pummel the shit out of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you want to grapple with the first attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to grapple with the first attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I need you both to make athletics checks, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck me, Gil! That's not bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the first attack, she reaches down and grabs you. Now, the giant elemental form has wrapped its fingers around your shoulders and torso. You're unable to move from the spot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do one more attack on him. Do I get advantage on the grappling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your movement is zero. Hm? Your next attack, you attack him. You don't get advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just attack him? Not good. Sorry, 12.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That won't hit me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thunderwave, 5th-level.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do 5th-level spells?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thunderwave from which one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From my Stone King Cincture.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. All righty. So go ahead and make, what's the saving throw on that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: DC 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: DC 16 constitution. Go ahead and make a constitution saving throw, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Saved with a natural 18.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 6d8 halved thunder damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she gets pushed, or does she not get pushed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Because she saved, she doesn't get pushed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so still grappled.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 6d8? All right. Halved. (counting) 29 halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so 14. End of your turn, Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't even attempt to break free.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you could have, but you spent it to cast Thunderwave. It would've if she had failed the save.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't get to add a d6 to that of hex damage, do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically you do, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, six points of necrotic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh no, she's down to 106.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Until the next turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm still higher.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are still higher.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, no, I'm not. Never mind. I'm at 107. So yeah! One point higher.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, top of your turn. This side stops closing in. This side does. Percy, you are now being smashed between the wall of the tower and the field as she's holding you in space. I need you both to make constitution saving throws as you're having to hold him there to keep him in space. But you have advantage because you're pulling away, I'll say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, 18. So it's 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a good roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically, since I'm grappled, do I go with her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because it breaks the grapple because it pushes you back. So that's 30 points of force damage to you, Keyleth. 15 to you. However, you are currently restrained as you are being held against the wall and the force field. You're pushed back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, and he's stuck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's being sandwiched between the stone wall and the force field, like (crackling). We're talking like Tetsuo-crush. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's my turn now, right? Or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, now it's Keyleth's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And that's when the Irresistible Dance kicks in. Delayed response.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take and through this wall, push it and start crushing Percy? Two slam attacks with the wall, crush crush?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, I'm into that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and make an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Against the wall or against Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The second one is a 19 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I won't have you roll damage because it's siege, but what you do is each one of these shoves forces him into the wall. So I need you to make two constitution saving throws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two constitution saving throws. Here we go. That's a 19 and a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both succeed. So that's 27 points of force damage, reduced to 13.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so that's 92 minus 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a shitty roll. Ten points of force damage, reduced to five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he take any from being sandwiched?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, he's taking the damage because he's being sandwiched.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Can I use my bonus action to go earth elemental again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to change to a different form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I will stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Percival, your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and squeeze around out of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of your turn, make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, fine. Natural 20. I really would've liked that on a shot, but that's okay. It would have made life way easier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Athletics or acrobatics, I believe. Let me double check real fast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I can just use my boots to squeeze off the side--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, it's not breaking from a grapple necessarily. It's from being pinned. This isn't weaseling out of it. This is pure force, so this would be athletics.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't try and sneak through the window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the window, it's a slit. It's like that wide and your back is pressed against it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Athletics, then? Oh boy. Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're still restrained.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't see her at all, can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, no. She's behind the wall, pushing you into it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. Huh. Hmm. Yeah, no, I got nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. At the end of that, the field pushes in once more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Breaks the wall, probably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, it's pushing against that. It's not pushing further, sorry, because they're both stopped. They're now holding that space. So you don't take damage again. It doesn't force you. But you're still pinned. Keyleth, your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is best right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to have a moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is best in life?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can I do two slam attacks on him again? Bam, bam, multi-attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pushing him into the wall again? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Twelve. Oh wait, it's hitting the wall, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're essentially just pushing against the wall. It'll shove, yeah. It's essentially a ten or lower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so 15 damage for that first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No damage on this. You're just pushing the wall, so the force against him. So make a constitution saving throw, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I make one or two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out. Roll a second attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the one thing I'm good at. Oh, not this time. Ten and 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten and 12. All right. You take, first, 24 points of force damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 points of force damage. Keyleth, I need you to make a strength check, please. Or a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Strength saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 17, so 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as it pushes back, you manage to keep it back and then shove him back into it. And then, oh my god. That is 25 points of force damage to you, Percival. And Keyleth, make another strength saving throw as the section of wall that you've pushed in, that's loose and you're shoving him with, is being shoved backward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've managed to hold it in place. Still restrained, you're slowly sandwiching him. Making a Percival sandwich. Percy, your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hail Mary. Trying to squeeze out of this. Nope. That's eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The ghost of Scanlan floats in front of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: (chanting) First blood! First blood!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't count, guys! 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, okay. So you take 13 points of force damage. Keyleth, your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth, my turn? Argh! Squishy squishy! Squishy Percy! Ooh, no, ten total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten total? Just barely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And second one, 12 total. Those were bad rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll two constitution saving throws, Percival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one succeeds. You take 11 points of force damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second push, you feel Percival begin to pop and squish against the outer field. And for the purposes of this, one more round of shoving and, with a (squish), Percival-jelly begins to ooze out from behind the wall in which you shove him against the force.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You hear everything I own crack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you were technically healing 20 points every round underneath the green beam--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit. Wow, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The field dissipates. The rubble begins to separate and float in space. The ruined corpses of all your allies then float aloft around you and are slowly re-stitched back to life. Grog appears, pulled back from the water dimension, from the depths of the drowning. And you see the bearded patron descend from above. As he pats you on the head and goes--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was never religious in-game, but now I am!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that-- (yelling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All hail the queen!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Without a spell to her name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Level 20 druids, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In 30 days, she'll know what happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, in 20 days I'll be like, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had the weirdest dream a month ago!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I dreamt I killed you, and you, and you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's funny, I was like, okay, once they start getting into the high-level spells this is really going to turn-- And then Feeblemind. All right, this is going to be a drag-out brawl to the very end.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was really hoping I could burn some grit back and then do a whole bunch of damage all at once.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But man, you dodged my Feeblemind. That was hot. That was amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did what I came here to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I went to the Water Plane with a few hundred HP left. I was super healthy in the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a sensory deprivation tank.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That deprives you of all the senses, eventually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had to get vengeance from fucking it up last time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So it's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, guys. Congratulations, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I finally won one!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks to Marvel Puzzle Quest!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, Marvel Puzzle Quest for sponsoring our ultimate fighting championship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is the most messed-up map I've ever seen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was mean. I started this game being the most clutch, powerful motherfucker on the planet and ended it like-- Confined spaces fuck gunslingers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm the queen. Everyone bow down to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
